path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Carpe Diem Smart Contracts Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: User can trick the referral to extract more CDP from the protocol
CDPToken is not protected for the ERC20 approval race condition
findings.description: The CDPToken contract is vulnerable to the ERC20 approval race condition.

findings.title: Use of payable.transfer() might render contract funds Impossible to Withdraw
findings.description: Transfer and send forward a hardcoded amount of gas are discouraged as gas costs can change. Also, on certain chains, that cost can be higher than in Mainnet and can result in issues.

findings.title: Function call can fail because of static length used
doDailyUpdate() call tx can go out of gas
findings.description: The doDailyUpdate() function call transaction may run out of gas.
